hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Bongo Bongo# holds...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Saria's Song#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path of #gold#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: You've met with a terrible fate, haven't you?

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Bombchus (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Graveyard#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 3 Bottom

HC (Malon).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the path of #gold#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #a Hookshot# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Forest Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Third Chest

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a school of #stingers swallowed by Jabu Jabu# guard #a Map of the Ice Cavern#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Deku Stick# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Saria's Song#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #the Lens of Truth# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

SFM (Saria).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Market Potion Shop#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that you must read the names of "Special Deal" items in shops carefully.

ToT (Right).text: Where did Anju meet her lover?^${12 39 C7}At a Kafei.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Hover Boots# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #the Temple of Time# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #gold#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
